anime.name: Sgt. Frog
anime.info: Keroro is a frog-like alien sent from his home planet on a mission to conquer Earth. But when his cover is blown, his battalion abandons him and he ends up in the home of the Hinata family. There, he's forced to do household chores and sleep in a dark basement that was once supposedly a prison cell haunted by the ghost of an innocent girl. He even spends his free time assembling Gundam model kits. During his stay, Keroro meets up with subordinates who were also stranded during their failed invasion.
#01: "KERO! to MARCH" by Nobuaki Kakuda and Juri Ihata (eps 1-51)
#03: "Kimi ni JUICE wo Katte Ageru" by GROUP Tamashii (eps 79-103)
#04: "Hareru Michi ~ Uchuujin (Omeera) Awaseru Kao ga nee!~" by JK (eps 104-129)
#06: "Kaettekita KERO! to MARCH" by Ichirou Zaitsu and Yuko Ogura (eps 155-183)
#08: "Nante Suteki na Doyoubi" by KERORO Shoutai (eps 206-)
#09: "HELLO DARWIN! ~Koukishin ON DEMAND~" by JAM Project (eps 232-256)
#10: "KERO! to MARCH (Shoutai Version)" by KERORO Shoutai (eps 257-)
#11: "Mendoku-Sei March" (メンドク星マーチ) by KERORO Shoutai (eps 308-358)
#02: "PEKOPON Shinryaku Ondo" by ONDO GIRL meets KERORO Shoutai (eps 19-26)
#04: "KERORO Shoutai Kounin! Netsuretsu Kangeiteki Ekaki Uta!!" by KERORO ALLSTARS (eps 41-51)
#05: "Katte ni SHINRYAKUSHA" by Naoya Ogawa and Mayuko Iwasa (eps 52-78)
#12: "KERO Neko no TANGO" by Osamu Minagawa and the Hibari Children Chorus (eps 193-205)
#13: "Omatase Pekopon Icchou!" (おまたせ地球（ペコポン）一丁！) by KERORO Shoutai (eps 206-218)
#15: "KE, KE, KERORO no Daisakusen!" by KERORO Shoutai (eps 245-256)
ケロロの秘密基地(ひみつきち)
